description: Pixel is an osciloscope themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its cat-like box body and laser screen, it brings a unique charm to the club. Its ability_scores are as follows: hp 7, charisma 5, constitution 6, dexterity 8, intelligence 9, strength 3, wisdom 4. Pixel excels in its skills of analyzing waveforms and troubleshooting technical issues. Its alignment leans towards neutral, with a strong sense of curiosity and a desire to explore the digital world.
name: Pixel
